definition: to adopt or carry out (measures, policies, course of action)/to take
to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
to take action/to adopt policies/to move on some issue

sentences.english: The onus now is on the government of Pakistan to act with sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦政府现在有责任采取有诚意的行动。

sentences.english: It's like having an array of stomp boxes ready for action.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个数组的单块效果器随时准备采取相应的行动。

sentences.english: At present, hospitals continue to operate on a fee-per-service model.
sentences.chinese: 目前，医院继续采取服务收费的运作模式。

sentences.english: If it is caused by anaemia you might have to start taking iron tablets.
sentences.chinese: 如果是所造成的贫血，你也可能开始采取铁片。

sentences.english: He also puts forward some countermeasures for China coal industry in heavy chemical industry period.
sentences.chinese: 提出了重化工业时期我国煤炭工业应采取的对策。

sentences.english: Some techniques could be applied to improve its quality and to strengthen its Maotai-flavor styles.
sentences.chinese: 可采取一些方法提高质量，突出酱香风格。

sentences.english: This is in addition to the seven villages that have now been remediated.
sentences.chinese: 这一数字不包括现在正采取整治措施的七个村庄。

sentences.english: The main factors influencing precipitation of electrophoretic coatings and their solving methods are given in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了影响电泳漆沉淀的主要因素和采取的对策。

sentences.english: Every country in Eastern Europe took at least one step to make things easier for business.
sentences.chinese: 东欧各国都为简化商业手续至少采取了一项措施。

sentences.english: And these various feedback mechanisms quickly facilitate jumpstarting the necessary people into action.
sentences.chinese: 这些反馈机制能够及时协助有关人员迅速采取行动。

sentences.english: We may take the form of a thermostatically controlled housing temperature.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以采取恒定控制罩温的形式。

sentences.english: In order for these techniques to be effective, you have to act on them.
sentences.chinese: 要想让这些方法变得有效，你必须据此采取行动。
样本的选取采取随机数字拨号的方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Take some effective measures to enhance the transferring rate of TB patients successfully.
sentences.chinese: 结论采取有效的措施，提高病人的转诊到位率。

sentences.english: Will the Chinese government request the Ecuadorian government to take necessary measures in this regard?
sentences.chinese: 是否要求厄瓜多尔政府采取必要措施？

sentences.english: "Upon detection, severe administrative punishments, including heavy fines and revocations of operating licenses, will be meted out, " it said.
sentences.chinese: 在监督下，将采取包括重大罚款和吊销执照等措施。

definition: to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
to put into effect/to carry out
